Resources

Credits

This document was originally created as part of the Facebook group Bmore ⚧ Trans, and is primarily managed by PK (they/them), who can be contacted at pkkimkowalewski@gmail.com.

It was compiled with considerable help from existing resource lists provided by Evan Lori Mahone, The Baltimore Transgender Alliance, Star Track, and Elliott Gillooly, as well as contributions from community members and leaders.

Feel free to contact PK with any questions, feedback, comments, corrections, and recommendations/submissions! We could especially use information about university resources at this time!

Organizations

NAME DESCRIPTION WEBSITE / SOCIAL MEDIA CONTACT INFO / LOCATION ADDITIONAL INFO
The Baltimore Transgender Alliance A coalition of Trans led and Trans inclusive organizations in Baltimore City working towards the upward mobility and empowerment of Transgender residents through advocacy and education. Follow on Facebook for updates about local events and local trans news. https://facebook.com/bmoretransalliance http://bmoretransalliance.com/ Baltimore Transgender Alliance office GLCCB 2530 North Charles St. 3rd Floor Baltimore, MD 21218 info@bmoretransalliance.com ⚧ trans founded and operated
Sistas of the 'T' An independent network made up of transgender women who believe that self-empowerment is the solution to many of our problems. They also believe that through developing sisterhoods and positive reinforcement, we can best help others achieve personal success. https://www.facebook.com/sistasofthet/ ☎ 410-558-7447 ⚧ trans founded and operated
Black Trans Men, Inc Advocacy organization and support structure for people of trans masculine experience in the black community.
Black Trans Advocacy, Maryland https://www.facebook.com/blacktransmaryland/ http://blacktransmen.org/
The GLCCB (The Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, and Transgender Community Center of Baltimore and Central Maryland) Community center, drop in center, and community gathering space with case managers on staff. Includes public amenities such as: sofas, internet, water, micro wave, refrigerator, coffee makers, air conditioning, heating. http://glccb.org/ http://www.facebook.com/glccb 2530 North Charles St. 3rd Floor Baltimore, MD 21218 (the same building as the Bank of America) ☎ 410-777-8145 fax: 410-777-8135 info@glccb.org ⚧ trans staff
GLSEN Maryland Local chapter of a national education organization that works to create safe schools in the Baltimore area for LGBTQ youth by providing education, outreach, and networking opportunities for K-12 students, faculty, and staff. http://www.glsenmaryland.org/ 8 Market Pl. Ste 300 Baltimore, MD 21202 ☎ 443-509-1108 ⚧ trans staff
SWOP (Sex Workers Outreach Project) Baltimore Chapter Local chapter of a national social justice network dedicated to the fundamental human rights of people involved in the sex trade and their communities, focusing on ending violence and stigma through education and advocacy. http://swopbaltimore.weebly.com/ ☎ 877-776-2004 swopbaltimore@gmail.com

Services

NAME DESCRIPTION WEBSITE / SOCIAL MEDIA CONTACT INFO / LOCATION ADDITIONAL INFO
Hearts & Ears (drop-in center) Peer-run drop-in center and advocacy organization dealing with the LGBTQPIA community and mental health http://www.heartsandears.org/ 611 Park Avenue, Suite A Baltimore Maryland 21201-4572 ☎ 410-523-1694 info@heartsandears.org Hours of Operation: Wed-Sat: 10AM-6PM ⚧ trans staff
Freestate Justice (legal assistance) Social justice organization that works statewide to improve the lives of LGBTQ Marylanders and their families through providing legal services including assisting with legal name and gender marker changes (formed from the merger of FreeState Legal Project and Equality Maryland) http://freestate-justice.org/ 231 East Baltimore Street, Suite 1100 Baltimore, MD 21202 ☎ 410-625-LGBT fax: 410-625-7423 Intake Hours: Tuesdays: 1PM-4:30PM At their office: 231 E. Baltimore St Suite 1100, Baltimore, MD 21202 Wednesday (after 2nd & 4th Friday): 3PM-5PM At the GLCCB: 2530 N. Charles St 3rd Floor, Baltimore, MD 21218
HostHome (housing assistance) A donor-powered hosting network of guests, hosts and patrons, in an effort to address unstably housed members of Baltimore’s LGBT community as well as the stigma associated with housing instability http://hosthome.help ☎ 1-833-HOSTME2 ⚧ trans founded and operated
Trans Clothing Closet A continually growing collection of garments obtained by donation, created to give trans folx free access to gender-affirming clothing in a safe, welcoming environment Baltimore Transgender Alliance office GLCCB 2530 North Charles St. 3rd Floor Baltimore, MD 21218 Available by appointment ⚧ trans founded and operated

Local Groups

NAME DESCRIPTION WEBSITE / SOCIAL MEDIA CONTACT INFO / LOCATION ADDITIONAL INFO
Trans Baltimore Support group of Baltimore's trans and gender non-conforming communities. The GLCCB 2530 North Charles St. 3rd Floor Baltimore, MD 21218 Meets 2nd & 4th Wednesday of every month 7:30PM
Baltimore Trans Ladies Picnic Monthly potlucks / intersectional community space created by and for trans women and male-assigned trans folx with the goal of providing a community space while also being radically visible in public spaces. Welcoming to people at any stage of their medical and social transitioning. https://www.facebook.com/bmoretlp/ Various locations around Baltimore city Usually meets monthly Date and location posted on facebook page as well as facebook events ⚧ trans founded and organized
Baltimore Trans-Masculine Alliance A supportive social venue for anyone who identifies on the trans masculine spectrum (trans men, female-assigned non-binary folx, etc) to network with others who may share concerns and interests. Welcoming to people at any stage of their medical and social transitioning. https://www.facebook.com/Baltimore-Trans-Masculine-Alliance-162601677108175/ The GLCCB 2530 North Charles St. 3rd Floor Baltimore, MD 21218 Room 2 Meets 3rd Thursday of every month 6:30PM-8:30PM ⚧ trans facilitated
Girl Talk at YTC / Star Track Bi-weekly support group for transfeminine folx run by YTC at Star Track. Geared toward youth under 30, but all ages welcome. Your Trans Care (YTC) at Star Track Adolescent Health 120 Penn Street Baltimore, Maryland ☎ 410-706-4789 Meets 1st & 3rd Tuesday of every month 6PM-9PM ⚧ trans facilitated
Guys Group at YTC / Star Track A support group for trans dudes and transmasculine folx (12-26 years old) to discuss issues, ideas, and experiences in a safe environment. Food + friends! Co-hosted by YTC and Black Transmen, Inc. Your Trans Care (YTC) at Star Track Adolescent Health 120 Penn Street Baltimore, Maryland ☎ 410-706-4789 Meets 4th Mondays of every month 6:30PM-8:30PM ⚧ trans facilitated
Baltimore Nonbinary Gender Support Community (Meetup) https://www.meetup.com/Baltimore-Nonbinary-Gender-Support-Community/ Various locations Meeting dates posted on Meetup.com community ⚧ founded, operated by non-binary folx
Hearts & Ears groups http://www.heartsandears.org/ Hearts & Ears 611 Park Avenue, Suite A Baltimore Maryland 21201-4572 ☎ 410-523-1694 info@heartsandears.org See online calendar for groups, dates, and times

Groups Outside Baltimore

NAME DESCRIPTION WEBSITE / SOCIAL MEDIA CONTACT INFO / LOCATION ADDITIONAL INFO
PFLAG Adult Transgender Group Owen Brown Interfaith Center 7246 Cradlerock Way Columbia, MD 18+, for anyone who identifies as trans Meets 3rd Wednesday of every month 7:30PM

Healthcare

NAME DESCRIPTION WEBSITE / SOCIAL MEDIA CONTACT INFO / LOCATION ADDITIONAL INFO
Your Trans Care (YTC) at Star Track Adolescent Health - Puberty blockers & Hormone therapy (Maria Eleni Nikita, MD & Hilary Wolfe, MD) - Primary medical care - Trans-affirmative gynecological services - Individual, couples, group, and family therapy - Referrals & coordination assistance for gender-affirming surgeries - Medical& non-medical case management - Confidential HIV & STI testing for individuals and couples - HIV treatment - PrEP clinic - Health education workshops http://www.startrackhealth.org/ https://www.facebook.com/lovelyytc/ https://www.facebook.com/StarTrackHealth/ https://www.instagram.com/startrackbaltimore/ 120 Penn Street Baltimore, Maryland ☎ 410-706-4789 (YTC) ☎ 410-706-6000 (STAR TRACK) bhenderson@peds.umaryland.edu mcarter@peds.umaryland.edu acopeland@peds.umaryland.edu SERVES AGES 12-26 Hours of Operation M-F: 9AM-5PM Health Insurance Accepts most private insurance (NOT United), Medicaid, Title X funded, Ryan White funded FREE THERAPY SERVICES
Chase Brexton Health Services (Mount Vernon Location) - Puberty blockers & Cross sex hormones (Deb Dunn, PA & Elyse Pine, MD) - Counseling re: fertility preservation - Individual, group, and family therapy - Case management - Pharmacy - Dental - Gynecological care https://www.chasebrexton.org/ https://www.facebook.com/ChaseBrexton/ 111 N. Charles St. Baltimore, MD 21201 ☎ 410-837-2050 Hours of Operation M-Th: 8AM-8PM Fri: 8AM-5PM Sat: 8AM-12PM Health Insurance Accepts most insurance plans, Medicare, and Medicaid; Sliding scale fee available
Dr. Ava Port & Dr. Elizabeth Lamos University of Maryland Medical Center, Midtown Campus - Hormone therapy (Administration & maintenance) http://www.ummidtown.org/programs/diabetesendocrinology/ http://www.medschool.umaryland.edu/profiles/Port-Ava/ https://findadoctor.umm.edu/details/24404/elizabeth-lamos-endocrinology_diabetes__metabolism-medical_specialties-baltimore 827 Linden Avenue, 2nd Floor Baltimore, MD 21201 ☎ 443-682-6800 Hours of Operation M-F: 9AM-7PM Health Insurance Accepts most private insurance (NOT United), Medicare, Medicaid
Towson Medical Associates - Primary medical care (Kimberly Baydarian, MD) http://www.towsonmedical.com 7801 York Road, #102 Towson, MD 21204 ☎ 410-769-4920 Hours of Operation 8AM-4:30PM Health Insurance CareFirst BCBS, Optimum Choice, Cigna, Aetna, EHP, Coventry Medicare
Karen Boyle, MD Chesapeake Urology Associates at GMBC - Labiaplasty (2nd stage) - Orchiectomy - Testicular implants - Treatment of urologic concerns following phalloplasty or urethroplasty https://www.drkarenboyle.com/ Greater Medical Baltimore Center Physicians Pavilion North 6535 North Charles Street, Suite 640 Baltimore, MD 21204 ☎ 877-290-5055 ajones3@cua. cfeeley@cua.md Hours of Operation M-F: 8AM-4PM Health Insurance Accepts most private insurance, Medicare, Medicaid, TRICARE (VA)
Beverly Fischer, MD Advanced Center for Plastic Surgery - Top surgery (Peri-Areolar or Double Incision) - Facial masculinization - Body contouring - Breast Augmentation - Facial feminization - Tracheal shave http://www.beverlyfischer.net/gender-affirmation-center/ https://www.facebook.com/drbevsbeauties/ 12205 Tullamore Road Timonium, MD 21093 ☎ 410-308-4700 beverly@beverlyfischer.com Hours of Operation Make an appointment online Health Insurance Blue Cross Blue Shield & United Health
Devin O'Brien-Coon, MD Johns Hopkins Center for Transgender Health - Breast Augmentation - Chest Masculinization - Facial feminization - Phalloplasty - Vaginoplasty - Tracheal shave http://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/profiles/results/directory/profile/10003798/ http://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/center_transgender_health/index.html Johns Hopkins Outpatient Center 601 North Caroline Street Baltimore, MD ☎ 844-546-5645 JHCTH@jhmi.edu Hours of Operation Call for an appointment Health Insurance Accepts most private insurance, Medicaid, Medicare
Samuel T. Goldberg, MD, PA - Psychiatry https://psychiatrists.psychologytoday.com/rms/name/Samuel_T_Goldberg_MD_Columbia_Maryland_102489 10025 Governor Warfield Pkwy, Suite 213 Columbia, MD 21044 ☎410-696-4428 Health Insurance Out of Network; Cash/Check Specialities Mood Disorders, Anxiety, Relationship issues
The Resource Group - Individual therapy (Harriette Wimms, PhD & Kate McCabe, LCPC) - Psychological Assessments - Psychiatry (Ariel Vitali, MD) - DBT Support Groups - Addiction Recovery http://resourcegrp.org/ 8501 LaSalle Road, Suite 115 Towson, MD 21286 ☎ 410-337-7772 ext. 1029 Hours of Operation M-F: 8am-5pm Health Insurance Cigna, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Johns Hopkins EHP, Medicaid
Village Electrolysis - Hair removal https://www.yelp.com/biz/village-electrolysis-baltimore 1621 Sulgrave Avenue Baltimore, MD 21209 ☎ 410-578-0033 Hours of Operation M-F: 10AM-9PM Free Consulation; Cash/Card payments
Shady Grove Fertility Clinic - Fertility preservation https://www.shadygrovefertility.com/ 720 Aliceanna Street, Suite 300 Baltimore, MD 21202 ☎ 443.822.3340 Hours of Operation M-F: 7AM-4PM Health Insurance Accepts most private insurance; TRICARE (VA) Egg Freezing $195/month
Heather Chase, LCSW-C Chase Counseling, LLC - Individual therapy - Group therapy https://www.chasecounseling.com 1110 Benfield Boulevard, Suite H Millersville, MD 21108 ☎ 443-955-8611 heather@chasecounseling.hush.com Health Insurance Cigna $140/individual session; $60/group Sliding Scale
Kimberly Gillette, LCSW-C - Individual therapy - Family therapy - Clinical letters for surgery https://therapists.psychologytoday.com/rms/name/Kimberly_E_Gillette_LCSW-C_Arnold_Maryland_296915 Arnold, MD 21012 ☎ 413-650-1151 Health Insurance BlueCross BlueShield, Cigna Sliding Scale $120-150 per session
Sean Lare, LCSW-C Sean Lare Counseling & Consulting - Individual therapy - Family therapy http://seanlare.com 6851 Oak Hall Lane, Suite 118 Columbia, MD 21045 ☎ 410-689-9074 counseling@seanlare.com Call or email for insurance/cost of appointments and scheduling
Kate MacShane, M.Ed., LGSW - Play therapy for children 3+ years old - Adolescent therapy -Family therapy - Individual therapy for adults http://www.katemacshane.com/ 1 West Church Street Frederick, MD 21701 ☎ 301-547-1375 kate@katemacshane.com Call or email for insurance information and to schedule appointment Specialties - Psychodynamic therapy - Narrative therapy
Lisa Mantell, LCSW-C Mantell and Associates, LLC - Individual therapy for adolescents & adults - Family therapy http://mantelltherapy.com/ 8811 Colesvilla Road, Suite 105 Silver Spring, MD 20910 ☎ 301-960-8546 Health Insurance CareFirst BCBS PPO; partial out-of-network reimbursement
Greater Baltimore Counseling Center - Psychotherapy for children, adolescents & adults (Jessica Rothstein, PsyD; Karen Hillman, LCSW-C; Lauren Vaszil, LCPC) - Medication Management - Psychological Testing & Evaluation - Group counseling http://www.gbcc.com/ 1850 York Road, Suite K Timonium, MD 21093 ☎410-760-9076 Health Insurance Accepts most private insurances
Women's Growth Center - Psychotherapy - Therapeutic groups and workshops http://womensgrowthcenter.com/wp/ 5209 York Road, #B12 Baltimore, MD 21212 ☎ 410-532-2476 womensgrowthcenter@gmail.com Call or email to schedule an appointment Health Insurance Most private insurance accepted Sliding scale
Nicole Hast, LCPC, NCC Capital Connections Counseling Center, LLC - Individual therapy for adolescents & adults - Evaluations and referrals for HRT & gender-affirming surgeries http://www.capitalconnectionscounseling.com/ 966 Hungerford Drive, #7A Rockville, MD 20850 ☎ 301-971-2950 nicole@capitalconnectionscounseling.com Health Insurance BlueCross/BlueShield Federal & PPO plans Out of network provider $165/session
Hearing and Speech Agency (HASA) - Voice feminization therapy (Jennifer Smith, MS, CCC-SLP; Sara Frederick, MS.Ed, CF-SLP) http://hasa.org 5900 Metro Drive Baltimore, MD 21215 ☎ 410-318-9780 hasa@hasa.org Health Insurance Accepts most major insurances

University Resources

NAME DESCRIPTION WEBSITE / SOCIAL MEDIA CONTACT INFO / LOCATION ADDITIONAL INFO
Gender and Sexual Diversities Resource Center Bowie State University - Resources for anyone interesting in learning about LGBT people, issues or concerns -Collaborates with faculty/staff/students to develop programs - Colleaborates with BSU's GSA https://www.bowiestate.edu/campus-life/division-of-student-affairs/gender-and-sexual-diversities-/ 1400 Jericho Park Road Martin Luther Kind Jr. Communications Center, Room 301 Bowie, MD 20715 hsierra@bowiestate.edu
Spectrum Frostburg State University Provides a safe space for everyone on campus, to promote equality for everyone, and to make a positive impact on the community for LGBTQIA students, faculty and youth https://frostburg.campuslabs.com/engage/organization/btglass Student Activities & Greek Life 101 Braddock Road Lane University Center, 209 Frostburg, MD 21532 ☎ 301-687-4049 mcooper@frostburg.edu
The Baltimore Transgender Alliance

We work to uplift the voices of transgender and gender non-conforming people in Baltimore City and continually center our community’s needs in broader political conversations.

2530 North Charles Street
3rd Floor - Room 1
Baltimore, MD 21218
Support

Support Maryland's largest trans autonomous project. Help get trans folks do advocacy work and get payed.

Donate Now!
Volunteer

We have lots of opportunities to work towards a common goal with the trans community.
